hero.title: Hong Kong Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Calibrated for vertical density, weather alerts, and time-sensitive transit changes.

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Prioritize airport express logic first, then decide final segment by weather and luggage load.
actions: Store backup route if airport rail is interrupted.
Preselect district handoff point for hotel transfer.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Use rail-first mobility with short road connectors where needed.
actions: Avoid long cross-harbor plans during active weather alerts.
Run station-to-station fallback pairs for key appointments.
Keep one inland backup plan for waterfront activities.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Maintain high-availability digital payments and immediate mobile data continuity.
actions: Keep transit payment method topped up.
Use dual-SIM strategy when mission-critical navigation is needed.
Store payment fallback list by merchant category.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: Weather-triggered schedule shifts should preserve safety radius and route certainty.
actions: Shift to indoor plans during warning escalations.
Keep accommodation return route available at all times.
